abstract: I switched to a Mac from Windows and was wondering what type of maintenance needs to be done to keep the computer running smoothly?
snippet: I switched to a Mac from Windows and was wondering what type of maintenance needs to be done to keep the computer running smoothly?
lead_paragraph: Q. I recently switched to a Mac from Windows and was wondering what type of regular maintenance needs to be done to keep the computer running smoothly. I haven’t found the Mac equivalent of Disk Defragmenter, so what should I do?
